about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am a professional numerologist and nail therapist with years of experience. I help people find answers to important life questions and achieve harmony through numerology and nail therapy.
about.description2: My approach combines traditional methods with modern practices, allowing me to achieve the best results for each client.

process.title: What Will You Get from Our Sessions?

1.title: Form a Request
1.description: We consult and determine your request to reveal the problem.

2.title: Analysis
2.description: In your case - we conduct the necessary analysis together.

3.title: Instructions
3.description: During the process, you will receive clear instructions for actions.

4.title: Problem Transformation
4.description: We work together on transforming the problem.

5.title: Time for Changes
5.description: We discuss the process after the session ends.

form.name: Full Name
form.terms: I agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
